title: Challenging years
creator_credit: David E. Barrow, Stanley Hawes, New South Wales Film Corporation and Motion Picture Associates
brief_description: Shows how some elderly men and women have planned for retirement. Illustrates, with dramatic vignettes, the positive and rewarding aspects of this period of life, and warns of the pitfalls to be avoided.
creator_credit_for_label: David E. Barrow, Stanley Hawes, New South Wales Film Corporation and Motion Picture Associates
